feed.title: FlareSolverr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for FlareSolverr: v3.3.14 (Linux-only hotfix)
entry.content:
• Linux - hotfix - some Chrome files no longer exist
  • Windows - release same as v3.3.14, reuploaded to avoid confusion

entry.title: New release for FlareSolverr: v3.3.14 (hotfix 2 - Windows & Linux)
entry.content: • Hotfix 2 - bad Chromium build, instances failed to terminate. Thanks @garfield69

entry.title: New release for FlareSolverr: v3.3.16
entry.content:
• Fix of the subprocess.STARTUPINFO() call. Thanks @ceconelo
  • Add FreeBSD support. Thanks @Asthowen
  • Use headless configuration properly. Thanks @hashworks

entry.title: New release for FlareSolverr: v3.3.17
entry.content: 38166df Bump version 3.3.17 (#1147) 8dea0ed Fix file descriptor leak in service on quit(). resolves #983 20cd294 Update README.md (#1127) fd773e5 Bump version 3.3.16 (#1105) 35c7bff Use headless configuration properly (#1104) afdc1c7 Add FreeBSD support (#1054) 0bc7a44 Update README.md c5a5f6d Add platform specifiers to dependencies (#877) aaf29be Bump version 3.3.15 (#1088) 800866d Fix looping challenges. #1036 (#1065) 043f18b Bump UC version to 3.5.5 d21a332 Hotfix 2 - bad Chromium build, instances failed to terminate (#1072) 3ca6d08 Hotfix for Linux build - some Chrome files no longer exist (#1071) 227bd7a Update Chrome downloads (#1070) e6a0858 Update README.md df06d13 Update README.md 993b8c4 Fix too many open files error. resolves #983 (#1033) a4d42d7 Remove unnecessary comment 1c855b8 Fix looping challenges and invalid cookies. resolves #1006 (#1010) 745c694 Bump version 3.3.11 (#999) f7e316f updates: UC 3.5.4 & Selenium 4.15.2 (#970) 16c8ab5 Update README.md 7af311b Bump version 3.3.10 (#969) daec975 Update README.md 8d7ed48 Add LANG ENV. resolves #951 220f259 Bump version 3.3.9 (#963) d772cf3 Fix for Docker build, capture TypeError. Fixes #962
